auto-greeting.description: Automatically sends greeting messages when joining a server.

auto-login.description: Automatically logs in to auth servers using a locally encrypted password.

hide-password.description: Hide password arguments in chat commands.

player-finder.description: Client-side Fabric HUD mod that displays nearby player information directly on your screen in Minecraft.

player-highlighter.description: A lightweight client-side Fabric mod that highlights players with a glowing outline while the player list is visible, without relying on any server-side mechanics.
